name: Sarah Naa Dedei Agbey
bio: Sarah is an experienced development practitioner with over 20 years' expertise in Planning, Organisational Development and Good Governance. She holds an M.Sc. in Regional Planning and Management from KNUST and University of Dortmund (Germany). She has worked with SNV-Ghana, rising to Deputy Country Director, and has extensive experience in climate change, renewable energy, environmental management, and capacity building. Sarah has implemented nationwide projects for UNDP, World Bank, Dutch Government and USAID, and served on Ghana's National Climate Change Committee.
